```{r}
# Load required packages
library(gtsummary)
library(dplyr)

# Use the built-in 'trial' dataset from gtsummary
data(trial)
```

```{r}
# ----------------------------
# 1. Summary Table
# ----------------------------
summary_table <- trial |>
  select(trt, age, grade, response) |>
  tbl_summary(
    by = trt,
    statistic = list(
      all_continuous() ~ "{mean} Â± {sd}",
      all_categorical() ~ "{n} ({p}%)"
    ),
    missing = "no"
  ) |>
  add_overall() |>
  add_p() |>
  bold_labels()

summary_table
```

```{r}
# ----------------------------
# 2. Regression Table
# ----------------------------

# Fit logistic regression model: outcome = response
logit_model <- glm(response ~ trt + age + grade, data = trial, family = binomial)

regression_table <- tbl_regression(
  logit_model,
  exponentiate = TRUE, # Get Odds Ratios instead of log-odds
  label = list(
    trt ~ "Treatment",
    age ~ "Age",
    grade ~ "Tumor Grade"
  )
) |>
  bold_labels()


regression_table
```
